ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... a ... this ... a ... Uhh how often do you hunt in kedge?  If you lag out you die, relying on our song.  I haven t relied on my song ever, since the time I
ygData.messageBody:
> > yes it does work the same, but if a bard has to sing the song
> > then they can
> > sing nothing else. therefore having the spell or an item
> > (fishbone earring,
> > singing steel gloves) is always used over the song. the song should be
> > memmed for emergencies in underwater zones.
>
> I disagree with this. Although I get an enduring breath whenever doing
> underwater fighting if this song effect drops you still have your whole
> breath bar to go through before you start drowning so even accounting for
a
> normal number of mixed notes you could do your 3 song rotation and mix
this
> one in as the third song every second time and you'd be fine. It worked
> once for me on a corpse recovery, but I do get enduring breath because its
a
> little too high stress for me. :)
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker

Uhh how often do you hunt in kedge? If you lag out you die, relying on our
song. I haven't relied on my song ever, since the time I died in kedge
because EQ's routers flaked out and I went LD. In a perfect world I would
rely on my song 100% to keep me alive. But EQ is far from perfect ;) I
welcome the EB effect on the gloves. The boots and greeves though kind of
irk me. Hehehe who cares if I can summon food/water. I carry 60 of each
with me whenever I hit town so what on earth would I need that for?

(muffins and milk ;) the ultralight food solution)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
